arStrings.szText: Access Runes through the Socketables tab in your Inventory.
Runes can be socketed into equipment with two sockets to grant powerful abilities.

To activate a Runeword, link a {c_RuneCondition}Rune of Ritual{/c} with a {c_RuneEffect}Rune of Invocation{/c}.
 
You may equip up to two pairs at a time.
Gain Offering with {c_RuneCondition}Runes of Ritual{/c} to fulfill {c_RuneEffect}Runes of Invocation{/c} and unleash its power on your enemies.
